action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. There is a purple cross shape, green L-shaped pieces, pink T-shaped pieces, and orange L-shaped pieces. The shapes are scattered and not connected to each other.

There is a purple cross shape at the top left, green shapes resembling the letter "T" in various orientations, pink shapes resembling the letter "T" in various orientations, and orange shapes resembling the letter "T" in various orientations. The shapes are scattered across the image with significant white space between them.
